song_name: Superstar Saga - Come On Again (Boss Theme)
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Superstar Saga - Come On Again (Boss Theme) is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Superstar Saga - Come On Again (Boss Theme) has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Dorian,  and D Phrygian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
